update.description:
This PR adds a simple demo. When you click in an object it returns the shape name in the terminal. Only works with ogre for now.

Addresses issue #19:
update.title: Mouse picking demo

content.raw:
Thanks for the contribution Ian! They are ok.  
  
I've just tested everything and it is working ok.
content.html:
Thanks for the contribution Ian! They are ok.

I've just tested everything and it is working ok.

content.raw: other than that, it's looking good

I made a few other changes in a2898ff:

* merged OgreSelectionRenderListener class with OgreMaterialSwitcher

* renamed `mouse_picking_demo` to `mouse_picking`

* added more doxygen comments

* style changes

Take a look and see if they look ok to you.
content.html:
I made a few other changes in a2898ff:

  • merged OgreSelectionRenderListener class with OgreMaterialSwitcher

  • renamed mouse_picking_demo to mouse_picking

  • added more doxygen comments

  • style changes

Take a look and see if they look ok to you.

content.raw: removed for now. a2898ff and cd5d2c6
content.html: removed for now. a2898ff and cd5d2c6

update.description:
This PR adds a simple demo. When you click in an object it returns the shape name in the terminal. Only works with ogre for now.

Addresses issue #19:
update.title: Mouse picking demo

content.raw: some minor style issues: could you change `NULL` to `nullptr`, and the Copyright date to 2018?
content.html: some minor style issues: could you change NULL to nullptr, and the Copyright date to 2018?

content.raw: fixed selection buffer picking in 4abc224 . The main problem was that the selection buffer material files were not installed. I moved them into `media` directory and now it should work.
content.html: fixed selection buffer picking in 4abc224 . The main problem was that the selection buffer material files were not installed. I moved them into media directory and now it should work.
